questions.question: Does the edited image retain the vibrant purple color of the subject's hair?

questions.explanation: In Image B, the visual cues show gold hoop earrings present on the subject's ears. Gold hoop earrings are identified by their round shape and metallic sheen. Observing a similar shape and color indicates that the earrings are still present.
